# what this is

This is a javascript package to turn python into c++

# import
how to import: import cpp

# packages required

None

# sample code

```python
import cpp

cpp.cout("cpp")
cpp.cin("cpp: ")

#thats all for now
```
# change log

added cout and cin

# c++ functions

```cpp
cout >>> "dawd" end;
cin <<< "dwad" end;
